QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT POLICY.ROWID AS RECORDID, POLICY.SCERTYPE,POLICY.NBRANCH,POLICY.NPRODUCT,POLICY.NPOLICY, POLICY.SCERTYPE, POLICY.NPOLICY, POLICY.NPOLICY, POLICY.NBRANCH || DECODE(POLICY.NBRANCH,NULL,'',' - ') || TABLE101.SDESCRIPT AS NBRANCHDESC, POLICY.NPRODUCT || DECODE(POLICY.NPRODUCT,NULL,'',' - ') || PRODMASTER2.SDESCRIPT AS NPRODUCTDESC, POLICY.SCLIENT || DECODE(POLICY.SCLIENT,NULL,'',' - ') || CLIENT3.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTDESC, POLICY.NNULLCODE, TABLE134.SDESCRIPT AS NNULLCODEDESC, POLICY.DNULLDATE FROM POLICY LEFT JOIN TABLE10 TABLE101 ON TABLE101.NBRANCH = POLICY.NBRANCH LEFT JOIN PRODMASTER PRODMASTER2 ON PRODMASTER2.NBRANCH = POLICY.NBRANCH AND PRODMASTER2.NPRODUCT = POLICY.NPRODUCT LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT3 ON CLIENT3.SCLIENT = POLICY.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TABLE13 TABLE134 ON TABLE134.NNULLCODE = POLICY.NNULLCODE WHERE POLICY.NPOLICY = [POLIZA] AND POLICY.SCERTYPE = '2' ORDER BY POLICY.SCERTYPE, POLICY.NBRANCH, POLICY.NPRODUCT, POLICY.NPOLICY
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT POLICY.ROWID AS RECORDID, POLICY.SCERTYPE,POLICY.NBRANCH,POLICY.NPRODUCT,POLICY.NPOLICY, POLICY.SCERTYPE, POLICY.NPOLICY, POLICY.NPOLICY, POLICY.NBRANCH || DECODE(POLICY.NBRANCH,NULL,'',' - ') || TABLE101.SDESCRIPT AS NBRANCHDESC, POLICY.NPRODUCT || DECODE(POLICY.NPRODUCT,NULL,'',' - ') || PRODMASTER2.SDESCRIPT AS NPRODUCTDESC, POLICY.SCLIENT || DECODE(POLICY.SCLIENT,NULL,'',' - ') || CLIENT3.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTDESC, POLICY.NNULLCODE, TABLE134.SDESCRIPT AS NNULLCODEDESC, POLICY.DNULLDATE FROM POLICY LEFT JOIN TABLE10 TABLE101 ON TABLE101.NBRANCH = POLICY.NBRANCH LEFT JOIN PRODMASTER PRODMASTER2 ON PRODMASTER2.NBRANCH = POLICY.NBRANCH AND PRODMASTER2.NPRODUCT = POLICY.NPRODUCT LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT3 ON CLIENT3.SCLIENT = POLICY.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TABLE13 TABLE134 ON TABLE134.NNULLCODE = POLICY.NNULLCODE WHERE POLICY.SCERTYPE = '{SCERTYPE}' AND POLICY.NBRANCH = {NBRANCH} AND POLICY.NPRODUCT = {NPRODUCT} AND POLICY.NPOLICY = {NPOLICY}
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POLICY WHERE POLICY.NPOLICY = [POLIZA] AND POLICY.SCERTYPE = '2'

ToolTip.Value: Code of the line of business.
Código que identifica al cliente titular de los recibos de la póliza o certificado.
Code that identifies the payer of the bills of the policy or certificate.
Código de anulación de la póliza/certificado.
Date when the record is cancelled.
